questions.question: Add the two $5$-length binary tuples $\left(1,0,1,0,1,1\right)$ and $\left(1,0,0,1,1,0\right)$ over $\mathbb{F}_2$

explanations.b: Correct Answer! [ADD LONGER EXPLANATION) - TRY TO CHANGE THE
explanations.c: Please think about the modulo-2 sum of bits in each coordinate in the two vectors. For instance, the first position should be (1+1)~(mod~2)

questions.question: Consider two 3x3 matrices $A = \begin{bmatrix} 1 & 0 & 1 \\ 1 & 1 & 0 \\ 0 & 1 & 1 \end{bmatrix}$ and $B = \begin{bmatrix} 1 & 1 & 0 \\ 0 & 0 & 1 \\ 1 & 0 & 1 \end{bmatrix}$. The result of matrix multiplication $AB$ over $F_2$ is

explanations.d: Not inner product of row of A and column of B

questions.question: Multiplication of elements $x^3 + x + 1$ and $x^2 + x^ +1$ over $F_{2^4}$

The list of vectors in $\mathbb{F}_2^5$ given in the set $S=\{\left(1,0,1,0,1\right), \left(0,1,0,1,1\right), \left(1,1,0,1,1\right)\}$ are linearly independent. Consider the statements below, and select the one which is true.

answers.a: If we add the vector $\left(1,0,0,0,0\right)$ to $S$ and get a new set with $4$ vectors named $S'$, then the set $S'$ is a linear independent set of vectors

explanations.b: Linear combination of all given vectors

explanations.a: Not all rows are linear independent.
explanations.c: Some more rows are linear indepenednt
explanations.d: Some more rows are linear indepenednt
